column1: 15 (+1 natural, +2 leather armor, +2 heavy steel shield), touch 10, flat-footed 15
Str 15, Dex 10, Con 13, Int 8, Wis 11, Cha 8

Solitary, pair, hunting party (2–5 and 1–2 hyenas), band (10–100 plus 50% noncombatants plus 1 3rd-level
            sergeant per 20 adults and 1 leader of 4th–6th level and 5–8 hyenas), or tribe (20–200 plus 1 3rd-level
            sergeant per 20 adults, 1 or 2 lieutenants of 4th or 5th level, 1 leader of 6th–8th level, and 7–12 hyenas;
            underground lairs also have 1–3 trolls)
